name: Barbaracle
description: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.

attacks.name: Rock Hurl
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Hand Press
attacks.effect: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.
